bibl.title: Forms and Genres of Alexandrian Exegesis on Lyric Poets. English Translation by Johanna HANINK. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - On the basis of the surviving ancient exegesis on lyric poets - especially Alcaeus, Archilochus and Anacreon -, pursues the aim of examining the different genres of scholarship attested in the papyrological tradition and identifying the characteristics of its original readers and 'users'.

bibl.title: Fragments of the Past. Ancient Scholarship and Greek Papyri

bibl.seg: PORRO Antonietta, Forms and Genres of Alexandrian Exegesis on Lyric Poets. English Translation by Johanna HANINK. Avec résumé en anglais.
Franco MONTANARI and Serena PERRONE (Edd.), Fragments of the Past. Ancient Scholarship and Greek Papyri = Trends in Classics 1 (2009) 2, pp. 183-202.

Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - On the basis of the surviving ancient exegesis on lyric poets - especially Alcaeus, Archilochus and Anacreon -, pursues the aim of examining the different genres of scholarship attested in the papyrological tradition and identifying the characteristics of its original readers and 'users'.
